scripts.cy:run:e2e: cross-env ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --env tags="@e2e and not @todo" --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run:e2e:report: cross-env ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --env tags="@e2e and not @todo" --browser chrome > cypress/reports/out.txt
scripts.cy:run:program:bdd: cross-env ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --env tags="@program/bdd and not @todo" --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run:program:bdd:report: cross-env ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --env tags="@program/bdd and not @todo" --browser chrome > cypress/reports/out.txt
scripts.cy:run:program: cross-env npm run cy:run:program:bdd && npm run cy:run:program:suite
scripts.cy:run:program:report: cross-env npm run cy:run:program:bdd && npm run cy:run:program:suite > cypress/reports/out.txt
scripts.cy:run:gui: cross-env npm run cy:run:e2e && npm run cy:run:program
scripts.cy:run:gui:report: cross-env npm run cy:run:e2e && npm run cy:run:program > cypress/reports/out.txt
